properties.entry: SELECT TRANSXML * FROM r,s WHERE r.i = s.i;
SELECT TRANSXML * FROM r JOIN s ON (r.i = s.i);
SELECT TRANSXML * FROM r LEFT JOIN s ON (r.i = s.i);
SELECT TRANSXML * FROM r RIGHT JOIN s ON (r.i = s.i);
SELECT TRANSXML * FROM r FULL JOIN s ON (r.i = s.i);
SELECT TRANSXML * FROM r LEFT JOIN (s LEFT JOIN t ON (s.i = t.i)) ON (r.i = s.i);
SELECT TRANSXML * FROM (r LEFT JOIN s ON (r.i = s.i)) LEFT JOIN t ON (r.i = t.i);
SELECT TRANSXML sub.o * 2 FROM (SELECT r.i AS i, r.i * 2 AS o FROM r) AS sub;
SELECT TRANSXML * FROM r LEFT JOIN (SELECT s.i AS si, t.i AS ti FROM s JOIN t ON (s.i = t.i)) AS sub ON (r.i = sub.si);
SELECT TRANSXML * FROM (SELECT * FROM r) AS r;
SELECT TRANSXML * FROM r LEFT JOIN (SELECT s.i AS si FROM s) AS sub ON (r.i = sub.si);
SELECT TRANSXML r.i AS ri, s.i AS si FROM r LEFT JOIN s ON (r.i = s.i), t;
